parameters.Blair: Assessment of the Labour leader, 1 to 5.
parameters.Hague: Assessment of the Conservative leader, 1 to 5.
parameters.vote: Party choice: Conservative, Labour, or Liberal Democrat
parameters.economic.cond.household: Assessment of current household economic conditions, 1 to 5.
parameters.Kennedy: Assessment of the leader of the Liberal Democrats, 1 to 5.
parameters.political.knowledge: Knowledge of parties' positions on European integration, 0 to 3.
parameters.economic.cond.national: Assessment of current national economic conditions, 1 to 5.

title: British Election Panel Study
description:
Description
These data are drawn from the 1997-2001 British Election Panel Study (BEPS).
format: A data frame with 1525 observations on the following 10 variables.
